__e: Like me, I'm covered in chickens, and I don't care!
Give me a big house with chickens, and I stay here for good.
I mean, maybe it would have been okay if it stayed with chickens and goats, but then that's when the townfolk took the law into their own hands.
I never wanted to do the chicken story anyway!
Well, maybe if you hadn't kicked him out of the house, he wouldn't have to go eat other people's chickens.
Fellows of the press, this chicken race tonight is for my daddy.
